simzombie.engine.environment
Class Cell

java.lang.Object
  simzombie.engine.environment.Cell
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Environments are constructed of Cell objects Cells specifically contain data on whether or not their have boundaries at two entry/exit points - the northern wall and western wall. Since every cell is next to another cell with no gaps, it would be redundant to have potential walls on each edge.

Since:
2011-10-28
See Also:

Method Detail

setNorthWall

public void setNorthWall(boolean b)
Sets whether the cell has a wall on the northern boundary or not.

Parameters:
b - true indicates a wall is present, false indicates it is not

setWestWall

public void setWestWall(boolean b)
Sets whether the cell has a wall on the western boundary or not.

Parameters:
b - true indicates a wall is present, false indicates it is not

getType

public Cell.Type getType()
Gets the type of the cell

Returns:
A member of the Type enum corresponding to the type of cell

isNorthWallPresent

public boolean isNorthWallPresent()
Sets whether the cell has a wall on the northern boundary or not.

Returns:
true if the cell is impassable at the northern entrance/exit

isWestWallPresent

public boolean isWestWallPresent()
Sets whether the cell has a wall on the western boundary or not.

Returns:
true if the cell is impassable at the western entrance/exit
